title.rendered: The Ritz-Carlton, Grand Cayman Becomes the First and Only Triple Five-Star Property in the Caribbean in Forbes Travel Guide’s 2024 Star Awards

content.rendered:
Coveted Five-Star Ratings Awarded to the Hotel, Spa and Blue by Eric Ripert

HERE (photo credit to: The Ritz-Carlton, Grand Cayman)

GRAND CAYMAN, Cayman Islands, Feb. 7, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — The Ritz-Carlton, Grand Cayman has secured the extraordinary honor of becoming the first and only property in the Caribbean to earn Five Stars for its hotel, spa, and restaurant, Blue by Eric Ripert, as announced today by Forbes Travel Guide. This exceptional distinction places The Ritz-Carlton, Grand Cayman among a distinguished group, with only 15 properties worldwide receiving this accolade.

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/the-ritz-carlton-grand-cayman-becomes-the-first-and-only-triple-five-star-property-in-the-caribbean-in-forbes-travel-guides-2024-star-awards-302055343.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
